title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

Load libraries
```{r setup}
library(fmatrix)
library(phylodyn)
library("phangorn")
library("mvtnorm")
library("ape")
library(dplyr)
```


Import trees and generate F-matrices
```{r}
dataname <- "temp2"

trees_list_beast <- ape::read.nexus(paste0(dataname, ".trees"))

Fmat_list_beast <- lapply(trees_list_beast, gen_Fmat)

encod_list_beast <- lapply(Fmat_list_beast, my_encod)
```


Load the TreeAnnotator MCC tree:
```{r}
mcc_tree_beast <- ape::read.nexus(paste0(dataname, ".mcc"))
mcc_Fmat_beast <- gen_Fmat(mcc_tree_beast)
is.Fmat(mcc_Fmat_beast)
plotF(mcc_Fmatbeast)
```


```{r}
sorted_encod_list_beast.encod <- bubbleSort(encod_list_beast)

# plotF.list(F.list[c(limit.l, limit.u)])

```
